page.title: 10COMMUNITY POLICE, SOUTH-AYR
page.content: {The role of the Community Policeman is to be part of the community in which he works. {Police Constable Dick lives and works in South Ayr. His job is to develop a good relationship with the people in this area. He does this by visiting homes and schools and by taking part in local activities. {P.C.Dick}walks round his very large beat trying to prevent crime. The main crime in this area is vandalism committed by juveniles. To try to stop this{P.C.Dick}spends a lot of time talking to children. {P.C.Dick}has been involved in the new housing scheme of{Kincaidston} since the very first residents moved in. In this way he has built up a very close relationship with the people in this estate.
